description:
100% natural. Since 1852. Contains no MSG/Gluten free. The best mustard 'round. A True Original: In 1883, Moritz Plochman pledged to make first-class mustards only. From creating the classic squeeze barrel back in the 1950s to adding new varieties over the years, we've remained committed to making the best mustard 'round. Made in USA.

Directions
Shake well. Shake well before using. To Open: Twist off cap and remove inner quality seal. Replace cap and turn red tip to open. Twist close and refrigerate to maintain freshness.

description: No sandwich is complete without mustard, so why not spring for the tried and true with a jar of Old Style Whole Grain Dijon Mustard from Maille? Each jar is chock-full of whole mustard seeds blended into white wine vinegar for a distinct texture and tang that livens up anything from sandwiches to roasts to marinades and more. With a medium level of heat, this dijon mustard adds just the right amount of kick to whatever you add it to.

description: Maille Traditional Dijon Mustard is a fantastic addition to your culinary repertoire. With its smooth, creamy texture and bold, spicy flavor, you’ll love adding it into your favorite recipes, mixing it into vinaigrettes and spreading it on sandwiches. This centuries-old mustard dates back to when Maille was founded and is an ideal condiment for red meat. You can even add to macaroni and cheese or potato salad for an extraordinary depth of flavor.

bullets: Spicy dijon mustard is made with finely crushed mustard seeds
